name: Demise (Porkate)
description:
Play-time - around 4 hours

NOTE

I OWN NOTHING IN THIS GAME, NOT THE GRAPHICS, NONE OF THE SCRIPTS, NADA.

- Have the choice of a traditional turn based battle system or action turn based. Change it any time!

- You can customize the way you want to experience the action turn based system.

- Several side quests with unique awards and optional boss battles!

- Large cast of fun characters.

- Character driven story.

- Difficulty settings you can change any time.

A long time ago, a small village was suddenly wiped out with no one in sight. Sadly it was never found out what happened to said village. However that isn't the case as one person does know, but vanished from the public. Years later a young solider discovers a mysterious group of demons that plan on wiping out everyone in sight for food supply and decides to face off against them. The only way to get rid of the demons however, is to cast a spell that forces them to leave the world. Due to him not having magic abilities he decides to search for the person that vanished from the pubic all those years ago. As he journeys on and fights the mysterious group, he meets up with several new faces and friends that share similar goals. However as he travels on he realizes something isn't right...

Main Character
A young soldier recently promoted to Colonel. He joined the military for the purpose of protecting others. He stays head strong to his ideology to the point where he'll do anything to protect, even things that may seem risky or ridiculous.

Gardo
The General of the main character's quarters. He may look intimidating but loves to joke around. He may not be the ideal General due to him not taking his job very seriously or spying on his fellow soldiers but he is still very respected and is a friendly face in the military.

Bernist
A magic user who isn't the nicest guy in the world. Known to be very cocky and arrogant but deep down can be a big softy. He joins the main character on his quest in search of his missing father whom he believes is working for said demon group.

Wendy
Wendy is part of a sketchy group in a village called Great Tree. She is an expert on physical medication and is a good fighter. Both with a bow and magic. She joins the main character on his quest because she felt inspired by his efforts.
